author: Nick Schwartz
title: Adidas came up with an awkward slogan for Derrick Rose
text:
Adidas came up with an awkward slogan for Derrick Rose USA Today Sports 22 hrs ago Nick Schwartz Derrick Rose‚Äôs latest signature shoe, the D Rose 6, released this October, along with a new slogan for the 2011 NBA MVP ‚Äî ‚ÄúNever Break.‚Äù
AdChoices ¬© Provided by USA Today Sports Screen Shot 2015-10-21 at 3.05.26 PM
Slogan Adidas is using on its Derrick Rose campaign this year pic.twitter.com/MoLLNy5Lzy
‚Äî Darren Rovell (@darrenrovell) October 21, 2015
Never Break. The new @adidasHoops D Rose 6 'Home.' Arrives 10/15. pic.twitter.com/XxtP21f7LC
‚Äî Foot Locker (@footlocker) October 8, 2015
Rose currently wears a protective mask after suffering an orbital fracture on an unlucky play in the preseason. This is a guy who hasn‚Äôt played a full NBA season since 2010-2011, and has started 100 of a possible 246 games the past three years. ‚ÄúNever Break‚Äù is likely meant to celebrate Rose‚Äôs incredible resilience and his latest injury is just bad timing ‚Äî but this slogan almost invites critics to respond with memes and jokes about his history of injuries (and, naturally, that‚Äôs exactly what happened on Twitter).
@darrenrovell Oh the irony‚Ä¶shouldn't the slogan be "Always Broken"
‚Äî Sam Greenberg (@sgreenberg24) October 21, 2015
@darrenrovell pic.twitter.com/S1LI0claFy
‚Äî Nick Johnson (@abefroman21) October 21, 2015
Lmao üíÄüíÄüíÄ @chicagobulls @drose pic.twitter.com/Q7MG6mMzwQ
